definition: Understanding written sentences and paragraphs in work-related documents.
anchor_level_2: Read step-by-step instructions for completing a form
anchor_level_4: Understand an email from management describing new personnel policies
anchor_level_6: Read a scientific journal article describing surgical procedures

definition: Giving full attention to what other people are saying, taking time to understand the points being made, asking questions as appropriate, and not interrupting at inappropriate times.
anchor_level_2: Take a customer's order
anchor_level_4: Answer inquiries regarding credit references
anchor_level_6: Serve as a judge in a complex legal disagreement

definition: Communicating effectively in writing as appropriate for the needs of the audience.
anchor_level_2: Write down a guest's order at a restaurant
anchor_level_4: Write an email to staff outlining new directives
anchor_level_6: Write a novel for publication

definition: Talking to others to convey information effectively.
anchor_level_2: Greet tourists and explain tourist attractions
anchor_level_4: Interview applicants to obtain personal and work history
anchor_level_6: Argue a legal case before the Supreme Court

definition: Using mathematics to solve problems.
anchor_level_2: Count the amount of change to be given to a customer
anchor_level_4: Calculate the square footage of a new home under construction
anchor_level_6: Develop a mathematical model to simulate and resolve an engineering problem

definition: Using scientific rules and methods to solve problems.
anchor_level_2: Conduct standard tests to determinesoil quality
anchor_level_4: Conduct product tests to ensure safety standards are met
anchor_level_6: Analyze aerodynamic systems to determine the practicality of a design

definition: Using logic and reasoning to identify the strengths and weaknesses of alternative solutions, conclusions, or approaches to problems.
anchor_level_2: Determine whether a subordinate has a good excuse for being late
anchor_level_4: Evaluate customer complaints and determine appropriate responses
anchor_level_6: Write a legal brief challenging a federal law

definition: Understanding the implications of new information for both current and future problem-solving and decision-making.
anchor_level_2: Think about the implications of a news article for job opportunities
anchor_level_4: Determine the impact of new menu changes on a restaurant's purchasing requirements
anchor_level_6: Identify the implications of a new scientific theory for product design

definition: Selecting and using training/instructional methods and procedures appropriate for the situation when learning or teaching new things.
anchor_level_2: Learn a different method of completing a task from a coworker
anchor_level_4: Identify an alternative approach to help trainees who are having difficulties
anchor_level_6: Apply principles of educational psychology to develop new teaching methods

definition: Monitoring/assessing performance of yourself, other individuals, or organizations to make improvements or take corrective action.
anchor_level_2: Proofread and correct a letter
anchor_level_4: Monitor a meeting and revise the agenda to ensure important topics are discussed
anchor_level_6: Review corporate productivity and develop a plan to increase it

definition: Being aware of others' reactions and understanding why they react as they do.
anchor_level_2: Notice that customers are angry because they have been waiting too long
anchor_level_4: Be aware of how a coworker's promotion will affect a work group
anchor_level_6: Counsel patients who are depressed during a crisis period

definition: Adjusting actions in relation to others' actions.
anchor_level_2: Schedule appointments for a medical clinic
anchor_level_4: Work with others to put a new roof on a house
anchor_level_6: Direct a project requiring coordination between multiple subcontractors

definition: Persuading others to change their minds or behavior.
anchor_level_2: Solicit donations for a charity
anchor_level_4: Convince a supervisor to purchase new office equipment
anchor_level_6: Change the opinion of the jury in a complex legal case

definition: Bringing others together and trying to reconcile differences.
anchor_level_2: Present justification to a manager for altering a work schedule
anchor_level_4: Contract with a wholesaler to sell items at a given cost
anchor_level_6: Work as an ambassador in negotiating a new treaty

definition: Teaching others how to do something.
anchor_level_2: Instruct a new employee in the use of a timekeeping system
anchor_level_4: Instruct a coworker in how to operate a software program
anchor_level_6: Demonstrate a surgical procedure to interns in a teaching hospital

definition: Actively looking for ways to help people.
anchor_level_2: Ask customers if they would like a cup of coffee
anchor_level_4: Make flight reservations for customers using an online booking site
anchor_level_6: Direct relief agency operations in a disaster area

definition: Identifying complex problems and reviewing related information to develop and evaluate options and implement solutions.
anchor_level_2: Lay out tools to complete a job
anchor_level_4: Redesign a floor layout to take advantage of new manufacturing techniques
anchor_level_6: Develop a plan to provide emergency relief for a major metropolitan area

definition: Analyzing needs and product requirements to create a design
anchor_level_2: Select a printer for an office
anchor_level_4: Suggest changes in software to make a system more user friendly
anchor_level_6: Identify the control system needed for a new process production plant

definition: Generating or adapting equipment and technology to serve user needs.
anchor_level_2: Adjust exercise equipment for use by a customer
anchor_level_4: Redesign the handle on a hand tool for easier gripping
anchor_level_6: Create new technology for producing industrial diamonds

definition: Determining the kind of tools and equipment needed to do a job.
anchor_level_2: Select a tool to adjust a loose part on a bicycle
anchor_level_4: Choose a software application to complete a work assignment
anchor_level_6: Identify the equipment needed to produce a new product line

definition: Installing equipment, machines, wiring, or programs to meet specifications
anchor_level_2: Install a new air filter in an air conditioner
anchor_level_4: Install a speaker system in a car
anchor_level_6: Install a custom-made production machine for a new product

definition: Writing computer programs for various purposes.
anchor_level_2: Write a program to sort objects in a database
anchor_level_4: Write a statistical analysis program to analyze demographic data
anchor_level_6: Write programs to analyze geological data for existence of mineral deposits

definition: Conducting tests and inspections of products, services, or processes to evaluate quality or performance.
anchor_level_2: Inspect a draft email for errors (e.g., grammar, punctuation)
anchor_level_4: Assess new parts for precision and accuracy to specifications
anchor_level_6: Develop procedures to test a prototype of a new computer system

definition: Watching gauges, dials, or other indicators to make sure a machine is working properly
anchor_level_2: Monitor completion times while running a computer program
anchor_level_4: Monitor machine functions on an automated production line
anchor_level_6: Monitor feedback control in a processing facility to maintain production flow

definition: Controlling operations of equipment or systems.
anchor_level_2: Navigate the settings on an office printer to print on both sides of the paper
anchor_level_4: Adjust the speed of assembly line equipment based on the product being assembled
anchor_level_6: Control aircraft approach and landing at a large airport during a busy period

definition: Performing routine maintenance on equipment and determining when and what kind of maintenance is needed.
anchor_level_2: Add oil to an engine as indicated by a warning light
anchor_level_4: Clean moving parts in production machinery
anchor_level_6: Conduct maintenance checks on an aircraft

definition: Determining causes of operating errors and deciding what to do about it.
anchor_level_2: Identify the source of a leak by looking under a machine
anchor_level_4: Identify the circuit causing an electrical system to fail
anchor_level_6: Direct the debugging of code for a new operating system

definition: Repairing machines or systems using the needed tools.
anchor_level_2: Tighten a screw to get a door to close properly
anchor_level_4: Replace a faulty hydraulic valve
anchor_level_6: Repair structural damage after an earthquake

definition: Determining how a system should work and how changes in conditions, operations, and the environment will affect outcomes.
anchor_level_2: Determine how loss of a team member will affect the completion of a job
anchor_level_4: Determine how a new piece of equipment will affect production rates
anchor_level_6: Identify how changes in tax laws affect locations of manufacturing operations

definition: Identifying measures or indicators of system performance and the actions needed to improve or correct performance, relative to the goals of the system.
anchor_level_2: Determine why estimates for the time to complete a task are overly optimistic
anchor_level_4: Identify the reasons why a client might be unhappy with a product
anchor_level_6: Evaluate the long-term performance of a new computer system

definition: Considering the relative costs and benefits of potential actions to choose the most appropriate one.
anchor_level_2: Decide how scheduling a break will affect work flow
anchor_level_4: Evaluate a loan application for degree of risk
anchor_level_6: Decide whether a manufacturing company should invest in new robotics technology

definition: Managing one's own time and the time of others.
anchor_level_2: Keep a monthly calendar of appointments
anchor_level_4: Allocate the time of subordinates to projects for the coming week
anchor_level_6: Allocate the time of scientists to multiple research projects

definition: Determining how money will be spent to get the work done, and accounting for these expenditures.
anchor_level_2: Use available funds to buy office supplies and record the amount of the purchase
anchor_level_4: Prepare and manage a budget for a short-term project
anchor_level_6: Develop, monitor, and adjust annual budgets for a large corporation

definition: Obtaining and seeing to the appropriate use of equipment, facilities, and materials needed to do certain work.
anchor_level_2: Reserve a room for a management meeting
anchor_level_4: Evaluate an annual uniform service contract for delivery drivers
anchor_level_6: Determine and monitor the computer system needs of a large corporation

definition: Motivating, developing, and directing people as they work, identifying the best people for the job
anchor_level_2: Encourage a coworker who is having difficulty finishing a project
anchor_level_4: Direct the activities of a road repair crew with minimal disruption of traffic flow
anchor_level_6: Manage recruitment and training programs for a high-performance company
